titles.title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act to authorize appropriations for the National Railroad Passenger Corporation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 100-385.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 734.

bill.summary: 4/25/1988--Introduced. Amends the Rail Passenger Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1989 through 1991 for the National Railroad Passenger Corporation (Amtrak). Exempts the Corporation from Freedom of Information Act requirements to grant requests for records which are: (1) intended for commercial use; or (2) intended for litigation or legal proceedings.
